original_title: 妻の残業NTR わたし、旦那に嘘をついて残業しています…。 めぐり
overview: "You ... I'm sorry. I don't think I'll be able to go home because of overtime until morning ..." The relationship with the chief started about a year ago. Due to my work, I had many opportunities to work overtime until midnight, and I was often alone in the company. At that time, I was whispered a sweet word, and I just worked unfaithful. My husband is currently looking for a job and will devotedly support the hard work. Every time I touch such a husband's kindness, I almost get crushed by immorality. Unexpected shock development!
title: My Wife's Overtime NTR Work The Truth Is, I've Been Lying When I Told My Husband That I've Been Working Overtime... Meguri - Meguri (Megu Fujiura)
